text: Antonio "Toni" Ucci (13 January 1922 - 19 February 2014) was an Italian actor and comedian from Rome. He appeared in 86 movies between 1948 and 2000. Ucci died from natural causes on 19 February 2014, aged 92, in his hometown of Rome. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian comedians
title: Toni Ucci
